name: LCA_COMM_ATT_REPORTS
description: This table extracts the related multiple response item LCA-455.

columns.name: COMMUNICATION_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the routing record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: ATT_RECPNT_REPORTS_ID
columns.description: The reports received by each attachment and recipient pair in I LCA 450
